title: PES CSE(MAYBE) OR MANIPAL ECE??
content: Context : I got ece in electronic City campus in first round.. i might get cse in second round(might.. not confirmed).. shud I go for that or ece in manipal campus.. i honestly have no past experience in cs or ece... So both of them will be new for me so I can't really chose which interests me..(fees isn't a problem).. I wanna know from some seniors abt their opinions.. üôèüôè

comments.body: Round 2 is also going to be offline right? Have tentative dates been published yet?

You're comparing between branches. You should take the one that interests you. If your main focus and sole goal is placements then take CSE , it'll also be a slightly easier subject since you said you dont know much about both. And placements will be good if you study well.
Not yet. The website just says that it will be held in July.
2nd round of counseling is usually held mid July. Note that the last few years were delayed but everything this year is on track as per pre-COVID timelines.
